interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 2.5% Retinol Cream with Hyaluronic Acid Serum - 97% Natural Review Date: 2015/04/16 Store: Key West Health & Beauty Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 6 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '799666510588', 'Manufacturer': 'USA'} Review Text: Retinol is one of the things that I look for when purchasing night time creams, as I am in my mid thirties and require a little help with the fine lines that I am starting to notice. I don't have a lot but the ones I have are enough to get me very concerned about what skin care products to use. One other thing that I am concerned about is my sensitive skin. I love the Retinol Night Cream by Key West Health and Beauty because it addresses all my concern: help with moisture retention on my face, eradicating what fine lines I have on my face and a formula that will work with my extra sensitive skin. So far, I am really loving this product!

I received one or more of the products mentioned above for review purposes. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for others. I refuse to review or endorse products that I have not or will not personally try. Needless to say, I may be a product reviewer but my thoughts are real and none of the things I say on my reviews are made up or fake - they are all based on my experience/s with whatever product I am reviewing. I’m just a regular consumer and I appreciate reading and giving honest feedback about products that regular people like me use on a daily basis or consider buying. My views and opinions are from a customer/end user’s standpoint. Review Title: So far, I am really loving this product! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
La Deessa Powerful 20% Vitamin C Serum For Face +11% Hyaluronic, Organic Anti Aging Skin Care. Hydrate, Moisturize, Increase Collagen, Reduce Fine Lines, Hyper pigmentation & Acne. La Deessa ['La Deessa products are the answer to compromised skin structure & integrity. With the utmost respect for our eco system, La Deessa sustainably combines Natural, Organic, Plant Based and Wild Crafted Botanicals with clinically proven & independently peer reviewed superstar natural and organic age-defying ingredients with highly effective delivery systems to create results-driven anti aging skin care products. KEY INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS: ALOE VERA increases your body’s production of collagen and is packed with essential vitamins including A, B1, B2, B6, B12, C & E. Aloe penetrates skin four-times (4x) more rapidly than water and accelerates skin cell reproduction by as much as eight-times (8x)! VITAMIN C supports every aspect of collagen production from stem cell activity to improving the structural integrity, resilience and stability of the skin. Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate is an extremely stable and gentle Vitamin C derivative and a precursor to Vitamin C; it waits to convert into Ascorbic Acid until it is fully absorbed, at which time the sodium molecules separate, converting it into pure Vitamin C deep within your skin...this prevents irritation and amplifies antioxidant benefits, making Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate a superior form of Vitamin C in cosmetic formulations. HYALURONIC ACID has the unique ability to hold more than 1000 times its weight in water, allowing the skin to retain more water. Amazingly, hyaluronic acid adjusts its moisture absorption to your skin’s need for moisture making it ideal for all skin types. Hyaluronic acid also protects the epidermis by scavenging reactive oxygen species generated by ultra violet light. Our formulations contain high percentages of Hyaluronic Acid. MSM- METHYL SULPHONYL MTHANE (ORGANIC SULFUR) Dubbed the “Beauty Mineral” Organic sulfur is referred to as the “Beauty Mineral” because it promotes oxygen transport across cell membranes (intracellular) facilitating cellular regeneration…resulting in skin that is more beautiful.'] {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Fragrance Free', 'Brand': 'La Deessa', 'Item Form': 'liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Gluten Free, Natural, Vegan', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 2 inches; 3 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LD-VITAC20', 'UPC': '040232150944', 'Manufacturer': 'La Deessa'} I have very dry and sensitive skin and read so many good things about Vitamin C Serum. This particular brand has been working very good for me - I have been using it at night and I have been loving it so far!

Please do check my in depth blog review on this product: http://wp.me/p1u6bQ-fB

My views and opinions are from a customer/end user's standpoint. Loving this serum! Yalmeh Naturals Eye Bright Gel Yalmeh Peerless Beauty ["Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel ranks as a superior Anti Aging product for all your skin. It is extremely effective at eliminating dark circles and wrinkles. It is also efficient for puffiness and loss of tone. SAFE, ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS- Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel contains all natural ingredients, no toxic chemicals or cancer causing additives - no mineral oil, sulfates or alcohol ,propylene glycol or paraben. We do not test our products on animals NEVER-EVER. This is the BEST EYE GEL and is an effective natural solution for all types of skin. And, it lasts forever - a little goes a long way. And what matters most, however, is that the Yalmeh Glory Eye Gel works incredibly well. You will feel better both inside and out. THIS EYE GEL is 100% natural & 75% organic Click the 'Add to Cart' button at the top of this page NOW - Your Eyes Will Thank You."] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.4 x 0.4 x 0.4 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEBG-Y005', 'UPC': '640671981439 885612923240', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} I have tried other Yalmeh products in the past and have been very happy with the results that I got. Needless to say, I had high hopes when I started using this eye gel. I was and still am very impressed with how well it works for my sensitive undereye area, as it really reduces the puffiness under my eyes that I am perpetually plagued with, when I wake up in the morning. It is also working so well as far as hydrating my eye area goes! This product and brand always delivers the results that I am hoping to get from skin care products. Love this brand and product!

I received one or more of the products mentioned above for review purposes. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for my readers. My views and opinions are from a customer/end user’s standpoint. ... You will also notice your skin is tingling and a little bit more rosy as it is reinvigorated.', 'Week 1:', 'After about a week of use, you will start to notice a drastic reduction in the visibility of dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles and bags under your eyes. Your skin will be smoother and firmer on a constant basis, not just in the morning.', 'Week 2:', 'As you continue to use the product, you will notice that the deeper wrinkles—such as the ones around your forehead and smile lines—will start to fade away. The saggy skin around your jowls and neck will have gradually reduced and in some cases, completely disappeared. Your skin will “snap back” when pulled, giving you the elasticity you had when you were much, much younger.', 'Absolutely NO fillers, NO binders, NO artificial ingredients and GLUTEN-FREE', 'ARE YOU EXCITED TO:', '-Instantly reverse signs of aging -Vanish fine lines and wrinkles -Reduce the appearance of age spots -Get rid of bags under your eyes -Firm and lift facial skin', 'Click the', 'ADD TO CART', 'button now to get this Skin Care Miracle in a Bottle!', 'NOTE: This product is specifically designed for men and women that NEED TO LOSE MORE THAN 10 YEARS OFF OF THEIR APPEARANCE'] {'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Combination, Normal', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 2.8 x 2.1 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Skin_Care_Bundle'} Vitamin C Serum and Phytoceramides - my favorite skin combo! I have been getting a lot of compliments on my skin lately and it's all thanks to these products! I don't think I'll ever give this combo up, as it has truly helped with my issues regarding skin dryness. It's well priced and most importantly, it delivers the results that it guarantees to give. This winter has been tremendously harsh on my skin and I don't know what I would have done, without these products. Go check it out - it's worth all the hype!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Concerns:** Focus on dry, sensitive skin with a strong need for hydration and anti-aging properties. The user recently expressed satisfaction with products targeting fine lines, highlighting the importance of moisture retention and compatibility with sensitive skin.

- **Product Preferences:** Maintains a strong inclination towards organic, natural, and eco-friendly skincare options, particularly those that deliver intensive hydration. Values effective ingredients such as Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, with a distinct preference for 100% natural and cruelty-free formulations free from harsh chemicals.

- **Usage Behavior:** Commits to applying serums and treatments primarily at night, demonstrating dedication to a restorative skincare routine.

- **Research-Oriented:** Engages deeply with product information, prioritizing customer reviews and authentic testimonials before purchases. Her recent interactions show enthusiasm for products that address specific skin concerns and highlight her commitment to genuine, trustworthy recommendations.

- **Honest Feedback:** Provides clear and straightforward reviews based on her experiences, reinforcing her role as a reliable source of recommendations.

- **Brand Values:** Attracted to brands prioritizing sustainability and holistic skin health. She actively seeks products aligning with her ethical values, emphasizing cruelty-free practices and natural ingredients while also appreciating stylish accessories that resonate with her personal aesthetic.

Overall, the user exemplifies a commitment to effective, natural skincare solutions and stylish adornments tailored to her specific needs and values.
